availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p:
State of New York
City and County of New York} ss.

I, N. William Busterd a Commissioner duly appointed by Executive authority and under the laws of the State of Kentucky for the State of New York aforesaid Do solemnly swear that I will well and truly execute and perform the duties of my station as such Commissioner

figure.ab:
N. WILLIAM BUSTERD
COMMISSIONER
FOR
NEW YORK

body.p: Subscribed and sworn to before me the undersigned a Notary Public in and for the City and County of New York this 27th day of January AD 1862.

figure.ab:
NOTARY PUBLIC
GEO. T. HAWS
NEW YORK

body.p:
New York
N. Wm Busterd
Oath
Filed Jany 30. 1862
